titleStmt.title: Graces, to be said at the table before and after meat Very necessary for young people and children, with morning and evening prayer.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Bell, and are to be sold at the east-end of Christ-Church,

notesStmt.note: The first and last leaves contain the same woodcuts.
Running title reads: A book of graces.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
